13.verification_summary: The claim asserts that supervised training of large deep CNNs with specific architectural and regularization techniques yields state-of-the-art results on large scale object recognition, which aligns with common trends in the field.

14.verification_summary: Based on the claim text and general knowledge, ReLUs are known to speed up training relative to saturating activations, which plausibly leads to faster convergence on CIFAR-10 and enables quicker experimentation for large architectures, but no specific experimental details are provided here.
